purpose.summary: This JCL job generates a catalog listing for all entries under the AWS.M2.CARDDEMO level. STEP01 uses IEFBR14 to delete or modify the output dataset AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LISTCAT. STEP05 executes IDCAMS with a LISTCAT command to produce the catalog listing into that dataset.
purpose.business_context: Supports catalog inventory and management for the CARDDEMO application datasets

inputs.name: SYSIN
inputs.description: Inline IDCAMS control statements specifying LISTCAT LEVEL(AWS.M2.CARDDEMO) ALL

outputs.name: AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LISTCAT
outputs.description: Dataset containing the output from IDCAMS LISTCAT command listing all catalog entries under AWS.M2.CARDDEMO

called_programs.purpose: Dummy execution to establish dataset disposition for deletion/modification of output file
Executes LISTCAT command to list catalog entries

business_rules.description: STEP05 executes only if STEP01 return code is not equal to 0
business_rules.logic_summary: Uses COND=(0,NE) parameter on STEP05 EXEC statement

paragraphs.purpose: Prepares output dataset by defining it with MOD/DELETE disposition using IEFBR14 utility
Executes IDCAMS LISTCAT to generate catalog listing into the prepared output dataset

error_handling.condition: Implicit file status via dataset disposition
error_handling.action: Dataset deleted or overwritten if exists via DISP=(MOD,DELETE,DELETE) in STEP01
Proceeds to execute STEP05 due to COND=(0,NE)

open_questions.question: Purpose of running STEP01 with IEFBR14 when it always returns RC=0
open_questions.context: IEFBR14 is a no-op utility that always completes with RC=0, making COND=(0,NE) on STEP05 effectively always skip to STEP05 but ensures dataset disposition
open_questions.suggestion: Confirm if this is intentional for dataset cleanup regardless of prior existence
